SEARCH
Package info.kgeorgiy.ja.konovalov.implementor

Class Implementor

java.lang.Object
info.kgeorgiy.ja.konovalov.implementor.Implementor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Impler, JarImpler
public class Implementor extends Object implements JarImpler
Class that creates default implementations of java classes/interfaces and its compressed .jar representations from a provided Class

JarImpler

See Also:
  • implement(Class, Path)
  • implementJar(Class, Path)

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String... args) throws ImplerException
      Method to use outside of Java to acces implement(Class, Path) and implementJar(Class, Path) use with two parameters for the first option and with three parameters, first of which being "-jar" to access the second one.
      Parameters:
      args - arguments array used by out-of-code users
      Throws:
      ImplerException - in same situations as accessed method
      See Also:
      • implement(Class, Path)
      • implementJar(Class, Path)

    • printUsagePattern

      private static void printUsagePattern()
      signature method used to print how main should be used
      See Also:
      • main(String...)

    • staticImplement

      public static void staticImplement(Class<?> token, Path root) throws ImplerException
      Actual implementation for implement(Class, Path)

      Creates basic implementation for class that is provided by token and writes it by specified path, to be more precisely, in a catalog that is needed, inside the provided root directory

      Parameters:
      token - class/interface that is being implemented
      root - path to root directory where to store the implementation
      Throws:
      ImplerException - if provided class was impossible to implement,
      IOImplerException - if could not write the implementation to the destination
      See Also:
      • implement(Class, Path)

    • transformToUnicode

      private static String transformToUnicode(String implementationCode)
      Transforms the given implementation code to Unicode escape sequences for characters outside the ASCII range.
      Parameters:
      implementationCode - the implementation code to transform
      Returns:
      the transformed implementation code

    • staticImplementJar

      public static void staticImplementJar(Class<?> token, Path jarFile) throws ImplerException
      Actual implementation for implementJar(Class, Path)

      Creates basic implementation for class that is provided by token stores it to temporally created directory, then created jar archive that is stored to the provided inside the provided root directory

      Parameters:
      token - class/interface that is being implemented
      jarFile - target .jar file.
      Throws:
      ImplerException - if provided class was impossible to implement,
      IOImplerException - if could not create directories to store compiled files or could not write the implementation to the destination
      See Also:
      • implement(Class, Path)
      • implementJar(Class, Path)

    • prohibitModifiersFromToken

      private static void prohibitModifiersFromToken(Class<?> token) throws ImplerException
      Prohibits to implement classes/interfaces that are private or final
      Parameters:
      token - type token for class that is to be implemented by implement(Class, Path)
      Throws:
      ImplerException - if class/interface was final/private

    • prohibitCornerClassTypes

      private static void prohibitCornerClassTypes(Class<?> token) throws ImplerException
      Prohibits to implement corner-cases classes/interfaces such as primitives, enum, record
      Parameters:
      token - type token for class that is to be implemented by implement(Class, Path)
      Throws:
      ImplerException - if provided class was primitive, or enum or a record

    • getClassPath

      private static Path getClassPath(Class<?> token, String extension)
      Generates actual java path for class
      Parameters:
      token - type token for implemented/extended interface/class
      extension - .java or .class
      Returns:
      Path that refers to needed implementation class

    • tryCreateParents

      private static void tryCreateParents(Path root)
      A utility method used to generate the directory structure (parent directories) for a given path.
      Parameters:
      root - target path for which directories need to be created

    • compile

      private static void compile(Class<?> token, Path root, Charset charset) throws ImplerException
      Compiles class (that is given by its Class token, that is stored at root path, with provided charset
      Parameters:
      token - implemented class type token
      root - path to implementations
      charset - charset to store compiled .class file with
      Throws:
      ImplerException - if could not find java compiler or some error occurred during compilation

    • createJar

      private static void createJar(Path root, Path classFile, Path jarFile) throws IOImplerException
      Creates jar archive to store implementation of one provided class
      Parameters:
      root - path to directory where to search implemented .class file
      classFile - path to class implementation
      jarFile - target .jar file.
      Throws:
      IOImplerException - if cannot not write implementation to provided jarFile

    • getClassPath

      private static String getClassPath(Class<?> token)
      Magically generating classpath from class token
      Parameters:
      token - class which classpath is to be got
      Returns:
      classpath for provided class

    • implement

      public void implement(Class<?> token, Path root) throws ImplerException

      Produces code implementing class or interface specified by provided token.

      Generated class' name should be the same as the class name of the type token with Impl suffix added. Generated source code should be placed in the correct subdirectory of the specified root directory and have correct file name. For example, the implementation of the interface List should go to $root/java/util/ListImpl.java

      For more implementation details see documentation to staticImplement(Class, Path)

      Specified by:
      implement in interface Impler
      Parameters:
      token - type token to create implementation for.
      root - root directory.
      Throws:
      ImplerException - when implementation cannot be generated.

    • implementJar

      public void implementJar(Class<?> token, Path jarFile) throws ImplerException

      Produces .jar file implementing class or interface specified by provided token.

      Generated class' name should be the same as the class name of the type token with Impl suffix added.

      For more implementation details see documentation to staticImplementJar(Class, Path)

      Specified by:
      implementJar in interface JarImpler
      Parameters:
      token - type token to create implementation for.
      jarFile - target .jar file.
      Throws:
      ImplerException - when implementation cannot be generated.
